headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid ALLE and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Allegion’s 28.5% return over the past six months has outpaced the S&P 500 by 12.5%, and its stock price has climbed to $169.97 per share. This was partly thanks to its solid quarterly results, and the performance may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
